0 Tactic - React Tactic
1 You may reveal Too Long, Didn’t Read from your hand when your opponent plays a tactic card with four or more lines of rules text in its text box. That tactic card does nothing. Discard Too Long, Didn’t Read afterwards.

0 Tactic Tactic
1 Draw a card. Set this aside with three garbage counters. Whenever a player plays a Toy tactic card, remove a garbage counter from Garbage Dump and that card does nothing. Then if Garbage Dump has no garbage counters, discard it.
